programme.title: Madrid Marathon Race 2024
programme.desc: The Rock 'n' Roll Madrid Marathon is a prestigious event in Spain with IAAF Gold Label Road Race status. The course starts near Paseo de Recoletos, passing landmarks like Biblioteca Nacional de España and Santiago Bernabéu Stadium, before finishing inside Buen Retiro Park. The event expanded globally in April 2011. The 2020 edition was canceled due to the coronavirus pandemic, with registrants offered options for entry transfers or refunds.

programme.title: Al Arabi vs Al Duhail - The Final - Handball Qatar Emir Cup Final 2024
programme.desc: The Handball Amir Cup Final 2024 sees Al Arabi facing Al Duhail in a highly anticipated match. Last year's champions, Al Arabi, aim to defend their title, while Al Duhail looks to end the season with a victory. Both teams secured their spots with impressive semi-final performances; Al Duhail defeated Al Rayyan 29-26, and Al Arabi narrowly beat Al Wakrah 28-26. This final, featuring the two best teams, promises to be a tough and exciting game.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2023/24 - Champions Special
programme.desc: Season 2023/24 has arguably been the greatest since the birth of the Premier League in 1992. Three elite teams racing to the finish line. Each of them believing this season will end in glory. The script of the story is captivating. Manchester City going for an historic fourth consecutive Premier League title. Arsenal looking for their first title in twenty years following their late season collapse in 2023. Liverpool looking to give their manager Jurgen Klopp the perfect send off as he says good-bye to Anfield after nine years. programme.title: Ligue 1 End of Season Awards 2023/24
programme.desc: Mbappe, 25, picked up the prize for the best player in Ligue 1 at the UNFP (French players' union) Trophies gala for the fifth time in a row after a season in which he has scored 44 goals in all competitions for PSG. PSG's domestic dominance was reflected in the other awards, with teenage midfielder Warren Zaire-Emery named young player of the season and Gianluigi Donnarumma the best goalkeeper. Eric Roy of Brest was named coach of the year after leading the modest Brittany club to European qualification for the first time in their history -- with one game left they are guaranteed to finish at least fifth, meaning a Europa League place at worst.

programme.title: Copa Libertadores Magazine 2024
programme.desc: The Copa Libertadores is the most important international football club competition in South America. Throughout the history of the tournament, 25 teams from seven countries have won the competition. Its rich history has been saturated with many legendary matches, iconic players and exceptional teams; from Peñarol's historical consecration in 1960, to Coutinho and Pelé enchanting the world with Santos's magical football, down to Estudiantes's unlikely success at the end of the 1960s, and Club Atlético Independiente being brought to glory in the utmost manner.

Coco GAUFF (USA) vs Ons JABEUR (TUN) - Day 10 - Quarter Final - Roland Garros 2024 - Philippe Chat
programme.desc: The 2024 Roland Garros is the 128th edition of the French Open overall. Within the Open Era, which began in 1968, the 2024 edition is the 57th edition. The event takes place from May 26 to June 9, 2024. This iconic clay-court championship features top players from around the world competing for glory in singles, doubles, and mixed doubles categories. As always, Roland Garros promises intense competition and unforgettable moments in the world of tennis.

programme.title: Roland Garros 2024
programme.desc: The 2024 French Open is a Grand Slam tennis tournament to be played on outdoor clay courts. It will be held at the Stade Roland Garros in Paris, France, from 20 May to 9 June 2024, comprising singles, doubles and mixed doubles play. Junior and wheelchair tournaments are also scheduled. It will be the 123rd edition of the French Open and the second Grand Slam event of 2024. The main singles draws will include 16 qualifiers for men and 16 for women out of 128 players in each draw. Novak Djokovic is the defending champion in men's singles. He will be contending for a record-extending 25th Grand Slam. Iga Świątek is the defending champion in the women's singles.

programme.title: Roland Garros 2024
programme.desc: The 2024 French Open is a Grand Slam tennis tournament to be played on outdoor clay courts. It will be the 123rd edition of the French Open and the second Grand Slam event of 2024. The main singles draws will include 16 qualifiers for men and 16 for women out of 128 players in each draw. Novak Djokovic is the defending champion in men's singles. He will be contending for a record-extending 25th Grand Slam. Iga Świątek is the defending champion in the women's singles.

programme.desc: TALKING FOOTBALL is an exclusive unique window into Spanish football and the people that have made it what it is. We dress as coaches and join their meetings and private discussions. programme.title: Borussia Dortmund vs Real Madrid 4K - UEFA Champions League 2023/24 Final
programme.desc: The 2023/24 UEFA Champions League season concludes at London's prestigious Wembley Stadium on Saturday 1 June when Borussia Dortmund and Real Madrid meet in the final. Real Madrid are looking to secure a historic 15th European title against a fiercely competitive Dortmund side. All the action is live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Olympiakos vs Fiorentia - Europa Conference League 2023/24 - Final 4K
programme.desc: The UEFA Europa Conference League is primarily contested by teams from lower-ranked UEFA member associations. The winners of the competition are awarded a position in the Europa League the following season, unless they qualify for the Champions League. Roma were the inaugural winners of the competition, in 2022 and West Ham are the current champions.

programme.title: Olympiakos vs Fiorentia - Europa Conference League 2023/24 - Final 4K
programme.desc: The UEFA Europa Conference League is primarily contested by teams from lower-ranked UEFA member associations. The winners of the competition are awarded a position in the Europa League the following season, unless they qualify for the Champions League. Roma were the inaugural winners of the competition, in 2022 and West Ham are the current champions.

programme.title: Atalanta vs Bayer Leverkusen 4K - UEFA Europa League 2023/24 - Final
programme.desc: Bayer Leverkusen have faced Atalanta twice in European competition, with the Italian side winning both legs of a 2021-22 UEFA Europa League last 16 tie. Bayer have only faced Internazionale more often while losing every game in major European competition (three defeats in three games) This is the eighth major European final between a German side and Italian side and first since the 2010 UEFA Champions League final, won 2-0 by Inter against Bayern Munich. In the UEFA Cup/Europa League, it’s the first since 1997 when FC Schalke 04 were crowned champions over two legs against Inter via a penalty shootout.

programme.desc: Brighton have won each of their last four Premier League games against Manchester United – the last side to beat the Red Devils in five consecutive league games was Norwich City between 1988 and 1990. programme.title: Manchester City vs Manchester United - Emirates FA Cup 2023/2024 - Final's
programme.desc: This match is a repeat of last year’s FA Cup final, where Manchester City beat Manchester United 2-1 to complete the second part of their league title, FA Cup and Champions League treble. It’s the second time in FA Cup history the same fixture has been played in the final in consecutive years, after Blackburn Rovers vs Queen’s Park in 1884 and 1885. Manchester City have won both Premier League meetings with Manchester United this season, beating them 3-0 at Old Trafford and 3-1 at the Etihad. The last time they beat their neighbours three times in the same campaign was in 1969-70.

programme.title: Crawley Town vs Crewe Alexandra - Playoff Final - EFL - English Football League Two - Championship 2
programme.desc: The sides placed from first to third in English Football’s League Two automatically gain promotion to League One, while four teams from fourth to seventh position compete in the play-offs. In the play-offs, there are two-legged semi-finals, followed by the final at Wembley Stadium. The winner of that match joins the other three sides in moving up to League One. All play–off matches are live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: Real Tomayapo (BOL) vs Internacional (BRA) - CONMEBOL Copa Sudamericana 2024 -MD4
programme.desc: Live and exclusive coverage from South American of the Copa Sudamericana. The competition began in 2002, replacing the separate competitions Copa Merconorte and Copa Mercosur. Since it started, the Copa Sudamericana has been a pure elimination tournament with the number of rounds and teams varying from year to year. Argentine clubs have accumulated the most victories with nine while containing the largest number of different winning teams, with seven clubs having won the title.

programme.title: Talking Football - Vicente del Bosque - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024
programme.desc: TALKING FOOTBALL is an exclusive unique window into Spanish football and the people that have made it what it is. We dress as coaches and join their meetings and private discussions. We talk to LALIGA legends in their environment about deep issues, their successes but also their weaknesses. We would like to lead the media agenda with conversations that you do not normally hear with managers, players and the most recognizable directors. All that presented by Guillem Balague.

programme.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Athletic Bilbao - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 38
programme.desc: Rayo Vallecano have won just one of their last nine meetings at Vallecas against Athletic Club in LaLiga, 2-1 in September 2014, failing to score in the last two, their worst run without scoring at home against the red and white side in the competition. Athletic Club have won nine of their last 13 LaLiga encounters with Rayo Vallecano, including the 4-0 win at San Mamés in the reverse fixture, and have the chance to record the a league double against them for the fourth time in their history.

programme.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Athletic Bilbao - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 38

programme.title: Celta Vigo vs Valencia - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 38
programme.desc: Celta de Vigo are winless in their last six meetings with Valencia in LaLiga, their worst winless run against them since November 2000. Valencia have won their last two away games against Celta de Vigo in LaLiga and have the chance to secure three wins in a row on Celta's home turf for the first time in the competition's history.

programme.title: Almeria vs Cadiz - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 38
programme.desc: This will be the fourth duel between UD Almería and Cádiz in LaLiga, with the previous three ending with the same result: 1-1. Only one meeting in the history of the competition has ended 1-1 in their first four matches: Recreativo de Huelva vs Real Betis between 2002 and 2008. UD Almería have drawn all three of their LaLiga meetings with Cádiz, making them one of three opponents they have failed to beat in the top-flight, along with Tenerife and Alavés. For their part, Almeria are the only team that Cádiz have also failed to beat in the competition.

programme.title: Le Havre vs Marseille - French Ligue 1 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: Having lost each of their last six Ligue 1 matches against Marseille, Le Havre could lose seven matches in a row against the same team in the top-flight for the first time in their history. HAC have scored just one goal in their last nine games against OM in Ligue 1, thanks to Olivier Fauconnier in September 2002. Le Havre have not beaten Marseille at home in Ligue 1 since April 30th 1988, a 1-0 win thanks to a Pascal Pain goal, going nine games without victory since ; HAC had won eight of their first 10 meetings with OM in the top-flight.

programme.title: Reims vs Rennes - French Ligue 1 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: Reims have lost three of their last four Ligue 1 games against Rennes, after remaining unbeaten in each of their first seven such encounters since their promotion back in the top-flight in 2018. SdR have conceded exactly three goals in each of these three defeats. 2019-20 excluded, Reims have lost each of their last three final games of a Ligue 1 season, each time at home. While Rennes are unbeaten in each of their last five such encounters in the top-flight.

programme.title: Borussia Dortmund vs Darmstadt - German Bundesliga 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: Against no side do Borussia Dortmund have a better goals-per-game average against in the Bundesliga than versus SV Darmstadt, amongst opponents they have faced at least nine times. Dortmund are still unbeaten at home against Darmstadt in the top-flight. SV Darmstadt have lost their last three Bundesliga games without scoring – the Lilies are yet to suffer four defeats in a row in the Bundesliga this season and only lost four in a row without scoring in the top-flight in December 2016.

programme.title: Borussia Dortmund vs Darmstadt - German Bundesliga 2023/2024 Week 34

programme.title: Bayer Leverkusen vs Augsburg - German Bundesliga 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: FC Augsburg have won only two of their 25 Bundesliga matches against Bayer 04 Leverkusen, but both wins did come last season. Borussia Dortmund were the only other side to defeat Leverkusen twice in the league in the 2022-23 campaign. Against no other team in the top-flight do Augsburg have a worse points per game average against than the Werkself. Bayer 04 Leverkusen are now unbeaten in 50 consecutive matches in all competitions, extending their record in the big-five European leagues. The Werkself's last defeat came on May 27th 2023 in the Bundesliga against Bochum. Leverkusen could now become the first team ever to finish a Bundesliga season without suffering a single defeat.

programme.title: Stuttgart vs Borussia M'gladbach - German Bundesliga 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: VfB Stuttgart are unbeaten in five Bundesliga home games against Borussia Mönchengladbach. However, after suffering defeat in the reverse fixture, Borussia Mönchengladbach could become the only Bundesliga team against whom VfB have failed win at least one point against this season. In addition, the only other teams Stuttgart have failed to win against this term are 1. FC Heidenheim and Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Last time out VfB Stuttgart celebrated their 22nd win of the season in the Bundesliga, a new club record. Their 70 points are a VfB record in a 34-match Bundesliga season tied with the 2006-07 championship season. The club’s Bundesliga record is 73 points from the 1991-92 title winning sea

Lanús (ARG) vs Cuiabá (BRA) - CONMEBOL Copa Sudamericana 2024 -MD6
programme.desc: Live and exclusive coverage from South American of the Copa Sudamericana. The competition began in 2002, replacing the separate competitions Copa Merconorte and Copa Mercosur. Since it started, the Copa Sudamericana has been a pure elimination tournament with the number of rounds and teams varying from year to year. Argentine clubs have accumulated the most victories with nine while containing the largest number of different winning teams, with seven clubs having won the title.

programme.title: Sports Clinic - Ankle injuries … between secured Surgery and New Methods of Treatment
programme.desc: From a simple sprain to a severe one, the cases vary from a partial disruption to a complete tear of the ligaments at the ankle level. This injury was once associated with certain sports such as handball, volleyball, and basketball, but over time it has become a concern for football players as well, following its widespread occurrence among its stars.

programme.title: Al Ahly (EGY) - Esperance ST (TUN) - CAF Champions League 2023/2024 - Final 2ND LEG
programme.desc: CAF Champions League 2023/2024 - Final 2ND LEG The stakes are high as both teams vie for the title, with the Egyptian giants seeking to capitalize on their home advantage against the formidable Esperance side in Cairo. programme.title: Poland vs France - 3rd Place - UEFA European Women's U17 Championship
programme.desc: Sweden will stage the 2024 Women's Under-17 EURO finals from 5 to 18 May. The hosts will be joined by the seven teams who progressed through round 2 of qualifying. The finals will also act as UEFA's qualifier for the 2024 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup, with three European teams to earn places in the Dominican Republic for the tournament from 16 October to 3 November.

programme.title: Sports Clinic - World Anti Doping Agency - WADA Challenges with New Future Vision
programme.desc: Since November 1999, when the “World Anti-Doping Agency” was created in Lausanne, supported by 650 sports organization including IOC and different sports international organization, WADA faced a lot of challenges. This special episode explain the mains reasons of WADA’s success and make the World of sports cleaner with a deep spirit of Olympic Charity

programme.desc: The 2024 Roland Garros is the 128th edition of the French Open overall. Within the Open Era, which began in 1968, the 2024 edition is the 57th edition. The event takes place from May 26 to June 9, 2024. This iconic clay-court championship features top players from around the world competing for glory in singles, doubles, and mixed doubles categories. As always, Roland Garros promises intense competition and unforgettable moments in the world of tennis.

programme.desc: Explore the sporting secrets of F1. programme.title: Feature Race - FIA Formula 3 Championship - Monaco Round
programme.desc: The 2024 FIA Formula 3 Championship is an open-wheel racing category serving as the third tier of formula racing in the FIA Global Pathway. The category will be run in support of selected rounds of the 2024 FIA Formula One World Championship. As the championship is a spec series, all teams and drivers competing in the championship will run the same car, the Dallara F3 2019.

programme.title: Feature Race - FIA Formula 2 Championship - Monaco Round
programme.desc: The 2024 FIA Formula 2 Championship is an open-wheel racing category serving as the second tier of formula racing in the FIA Global Pathway. programme.title: DTM Dekra Lausitzring - Race 1
programme.desc: The DTM, or Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters, is a top touring car racing series known for its high-speed action and fierce competition. With thrilling battles and technical challenges, it offers fans an adrenaline-fueled experience, showcasing the best in automotive engineering and racing talent.

programme.title: La Charreada
La Charreada
Final Euro 1984 (France vs Spain) - UEFA Euro Historical Finals
programme.desc: "Every battle ever fought on the pitch has one goal: to reach the final and snatch the title. Obviously, all the major tournaments’ finals remain carved in our memory. Therefore, we take a trip down memory lane, to reminisce over memories of past historical finals, since 1960 until 2016.Today’s game is the 1984 Final between France and Spain in Paris and the title was won by France"

programme.title: Final Euro 1984 (France vs Spain) - UEFA Euro Historical Finals
programme.desc: "Every battle ever fought on the pitch has one goal: to reach the final and snatch the title. Obviously, all the major tournaments’ finals remain carved in our memory. Therefore, we take a trip down memory lane, to reminisce over memories of past historical finals, since 1960 until 2016.Today’s game is the 1984 Final between France and Spain in Paris and the title was won by France"

programme.title: Road to UEFA EURO 2024
programme.desc: The UEFA EURO 2024 final tournament is scheduled to take place from 14 June to 14 July 2024. As the host nation, Germany are seeded in Group A and will occupy position A1; they will therefore play in the opening match at the Munich Football Arena on Friday 14 June. Germany/West Germany have featured at every EURO since 1972. West Germany won the 1972 and 1980 editions, while the reunited Germany triumphed at EURO '96. The ten venues chosen to host games at the tournament include nine of the stadiums used at the 2006 World Cup plus the Düsseldorf Arena.

programme.title: 2012 The Score - UEFA Euro the Official Story
programme.desc: 100 Days to UEFA Euro 2024 - Wednesday 6th March 2024 is 100 days until the opening match of the UEFA Euro 2024. beIN Sports marks the anniversary with a day of UEFA Euro programming. Germany will host the tournament, which takes place from 14 June to 14 July 2024. UEFA Euro 2024 is live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Road to UEFA EURO 2024
programme.desc: The UEFA EURO 2024 final tournament is scheduled to take place from 14 June to 14 July 2024. As the host nation, Germany are seeded in Group A and will occupy position A1; they will therefore play in the opening match at the Munich Football Arena on Friday 14 June. Germany/West Germany have featured at every EURO since 1972. West Germany won the 1972 and 1980 editions, while the reunited Germany triumphed at EURO '96. The ten venues chosen to host games at the tournament include nine of the stadiums used at the 2006 World Cup plus the Düsseldorf Arena.
